dcterms:description: A dataset used for identifying toxic comments in online conversations, available through the Kaggle competition. The dataset includes comments labeled with various identity contexts, which are crucial for training a fair classifier.
dcterms:title: Toxic Comment Classification Challenge

dcterms:creator: M. De-Arteaga
A. Romanov
H. Wallach
J. Chayes
C. Borgs
A. Chouldechova
S. Geyik
K. Kenthapadi
A. T. Kalai
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 400k textual bio descriptions aimed at predicting one of 28 occupations, used to study fairness in occupation prediction.
dcterms:title: Bias in Bios

dcterms:creator: K. Bache
M. Lichman
dcterms:description: A dataset used for predicting whether a person earns more than $50k per year based on various demographic features.
dcterms:title: Adult dataset

dcterms:creator: H. Zhao
A. Coston
T. Adel
G. J. Gordon
dcterms:description: A dataset used for studying fairness in algorithmic decision-making, particularly in the context of criminal justice.
dcterms:title: COMPAS Data
